title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
notes: Primary reference for module size limits and single responsibility

title: Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code
author: Martin Fowler
notes: Key patterns for safe refactoring of large files

title: PEP 8 -- Style Guide for Python Code
author: Python Software Foundation
notes: Python coding conventions and module organization

title: PEP 257 -- Docstring Conventions
author: Python Software Foundation
notes: Documentation standards for modules and functions

title: Google Python Style Guide
author: Google
notes: Industry best practices for Python projects

title: The Magical Number Seven Plus or Minus Two
author: George A. Miller
notes: Cognitive load theory supporting small module sizes

title: Python Packaging User Guide
author: Python Packaging Authority
notes: Package structure and import best practices

title: Typer Documentation
author: Sebastián Ramírez
notes: CLI framework patterns and command structure

title: Rich Documentation
author: Will McGugan
notes: Terminal UI components and progress tracking
